DOC.brief_summary: Conventional luteal phase support human chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) trigger woman undergo vitro fertilization/intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( IVF/ICSI ) provide adequate pregnancy rate live birth rate , Ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) still occur 1-3 % patient . If gonadotropin-releasing hormone agonist ( GnRHa ) use instead hCG , OHSS occur , clinical result somehow diminish . By test different luteal support protocol woman undergo GnRHa triggering , investigator aim find protocol resembles gene expression profile observe hCG trigger conventional luteal phase support , order choose adequate term endometrium receptivity safety ( OHSS incidence ) .
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Receptivity After GnRH Agonist Triggering
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy oocyte donor woman Aged 1835 year With menstrual cycle length 2635 day Normal ultrasound scan uterus ovary Normal basal hormones No contraindication control ovarian stimulation ( COS ) Willing participate study provide write informed consent . Subjects current previous history endocrine abnormality Subjects abnormal outcome blood biochemistry hematology Subjects abnormal cervical smear Subjects chronic disease Subjects relevant ovarian , tubal uterinepathology could interfere COS treatment Pregnancy Subjects previous history ovarian hyperresponse ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) , polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) basal antral follicle count ( AFC ) 20 ultrasound ( 11 mm , ovary combine ) . Previous low ovarian response FSH hMG treatment ( i.e . cycle cancel due insufficient ovarian response le 6 oocyte obtain ) . A history recurrent miscarriage , Smoking 10 cigarette per day . Not willing comply study procedure
